.@realDonaldTrump will grow the economy with tax cuts for working families and end regulations stifling job creation!
.@realDonaldTrump will grow the economy with tax cuts for working families and end regulations stifling job creation!
We must simplify the tax code, reduce business tax rates, and make America competitive in the global economy!
We must simplify the tax code, reduce business tax rates, and make America competitive in the global economy!
We will end Obama-era policies that have held back growth, and unleash the new jobs Americans need and deserve!
We will end Obama-era policies that have held back growth, and unleash the new jobs Americans need and deserve!
